title: Rituximab Prediction Gap Analysis

key_findings.root_cause: kNN neighbor GT coverage determines drug recommendations
key_findings.follicular_lymphoma: Zero neighbors have Rituximab - cannot be predicted
key_findings.burkitt_lymphoma: Zero neighbors have Rituximab - cannot be predicted
key_findings.dlbcl: One neighbor (microscopic polyangiitis) has Rituximab but score too low
key_findings.pattern: Diseases WHERE Rituximab IS predicted all have exactly 1 neighbor with Rituximab

actionable_insight: Adding more Rituximab-containing diseases to GT would help, or boosting Rituximab for known CD20+ diseases manually

follicular lymphoma.root_cause: No neighbors have Rituximab in GT (coverage gap)

burkitt lymphoma.root_cause: No neighbors have Rituximab in GT (coverage gap)

small lymphocytic lymphoma.root_cause: Score just barely makes it into top 30
